name: overheat
effect: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages.
short_effect: Lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user attacks the target at full power. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user attacks the target at full power. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user attacks the target at full power. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
